body.p: This week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter opens with news from Portage, better Ada toolchain support, and an upgrade to Gnome's latest version 2.14 for Gentoo users. "Friends of Gentoo", the German NFP, have designed a small quiz for aspiring power users, and there's plenty more: news from the developer community, developers leaving and others being added, press clippings, the Gentoo Linux Security Announcements since 1 May, and the bugzilla statistics. Enjoy this week's issue of the GWN!
